tool_description: Processes customer refunds for shipping issues, calculates refund amounts, and initiates payment reversals.

order_id.description: Order ID for which refund is being processed

refund_type.description: Type of refund (full, partial, shipping_only, product_only)

refund_reason.description: Reason for refund (damaged, lost, delayed, customer_request, etc.)

refund_amount.description: Specific refund amount for partial refunds

error_messages: Order not found: The specified order ID does not exist in the system.
Customer mismatch: The customer ID does not match the order owner.
Invalid refund type: Use one of (full, partial, shipping_only, product_only).
Refund amount required: Specify refund_amount for partial refund type.
Refund amount exceeds order total: Refund amount cannot exceed the original order value.
Refund already processed: A refund has already been processed for this order.
Payment method unavailable: Original payment method is no longer valid for refund.
usage: Provide order_id, customer_id, refund_type, and refund_reason. For partial refunds, specify the refund_amount. The tool processes the refund and returns confirmation details.

refund_id.description: Unique identifier for the refund transaction

refund_status.description: Status of the refund (processed, pending, failed)

expected_credit_date.description: Expected date when customer will see refund credited
